title: LKS Web Technology Kabupaten Purbalingga
organizer: Kementerian Pendidikan dan Kebudayaan (Ministry of Education and Culture)
description: Create a complete school website along with admin and front end pages. Created using the PHP framework Laravel and CSS framework Bootstrap in 7 - 8 hours.

title: IITC Web Design Competition
description: Create an UI interface on a website so that it can be used comfortably, especially in the fields of e-commerce, portfolios, companies, economics and education. This competition builds the design of a web using HTML and native CSS
certificate: Sertifikat_Juara 1 IITC Intermedia Universitas Amikom Purwokerto 2020.jpg
